misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The use of the AES algorithm without specifying the key size and mode of operation is considered a misuse. It is recommended to use the `AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding` algorithm instead, which is considered more secure.
recommendation: Use the `AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding` algorithm instead of `AES` to ensure proper key size and mode of operation are used.
